Title: BP delivers its first carbon offset LNG cargo to Mexico’s Energia Costa Azul
Description: BP has struck a deal with Sempra LNG and Mexico’s energy infrastructure firm Infraestructura Energetica Nova (IEnova) to deliver its first carbon-offset LNG cargo to the 7.6 million tonnes a year (mtpa) Energia Costa Azul (ECA) receiving terminal in Mexico on July 16
Author: CK
